akn:section.akn:heading: Educational institutions not maintaining units of Junior Reserve Officers’ Training Corps: issuance

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2034. Educational institutions not maintaining units of Junior Reserve Officers’ Training Corps: issuance of arms, tentage, and equipment The Secretary of a military department may issue arms, tentage, and equipment to an educational institution at which no unit of the Junior Reserve Officers’ Training Corps is maintained if the educational institution—(1) offers a course in military training prescribed by that Secretary; and
(2) has a student body of at least 50 students who are in a grade above the eighth grade.
(Added Pub. L. 112–239, div. A, title V, § 552(a), Jan. 2, 2013, 126 Stat. 1741.)
(1) offers a course in military training prescribed by that Secretary; and
(2) has a student body of at least 50 students who are in a grade above the eighth grade.
